plot: A grief stricken man must join forces with a mysterious clairvoyant in a race against time to save himself and his dead fiancée.
title: The Thread
plot_es: A grief stricken man must join forces with a mysterious clairvoyant in a race against time to save himself and his dead fiancée.
plot_en: A grief stricken man must join forces with a mysterious clairvoyant in a race against time to save himself and his dead fiancée.
